title: Issa Coup, Venus = Russian Planet? 9.25.20
itunes:title: Issa Coup, Venus = Russian Planet? 9.25.20
description:
In episode 723, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Dani Fernandez to discuss Republicans pushing back on Trump's comments about the transfer of power, what to do if there is a possible coup, Joe Biden preparing for the debates, possible life on Venus, what we're watching, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. McConnell pushes back on Trump: 'There will be an orderly transition'
  2. 10 things you need to know to stop a coup
  3. The Election That Could Break America
  4. Trump Encourages People in North Carolina to Vote Twice, Which Is Illegal
  5. 'Gerrymandering On Steroids': How Republicans Stacked The Nation's Statehouses
  6. This is what an American coup looks like
  7. The Debates Could Seal Biden’s Fate
  8. Republican Inquiry Finds No Evidence of Wrongdoing by Biden
  9. Astronomers may have found hints of life in clouds of Venus
  10. Earth life may have traveled to Venus aboard sky-skimming asteroid
  11. NASA may prioritize Venus missions after recent discovery of possible life
  12. The Search for Life on Venus Could Start With This Private Company
  13. NASA Climate Modeling Suggests Venus May Have Been Habitable
  14. WATCH: Cleo Sol - One (Official Video)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
